wargaye jiwithayak aththatama gathakarana dukgannarala rupawahiniya issaraha mada soda nogath gowiyage bhumikawata athul wenawa."ragapanawa".thaman gamiya kiyala pennanna hadanawa.ohuge pawathma ee ragimath ekkayi gata gahila thiyenne.ithin jayamahage nirahankarithwaya mewannange ahalakawath nathi wima ahambauwak nemeyi.
udin monawa porondu wunath ingirisin digata ma kriya kara aththe sinhala bauddhayan nowannanta rate wadagath thanak himi kara dimata
ee wenath ratawala, enam diyunu wana ratawala di nipadawana lada drawya wenuweni.

hm.....eelagata usas pela iwara korala akwayinas giya....kalin padamak igana gaththa nisa man mage paduwe paththakata wela mage wada karagena innakota ekkenek api hamomawa hinassuwa....eya anthimedi mage hondama yaluwa una...adatath mageth ekka inna hondama yaluwek eya....tha ekkenak hitiya..eya nitharama mawa kenthi gassuwa....hm....anthimedi eya balenma mage ayya una....eyage garl frend ma ekka hari hondayi.....api kattiya trip giya....trip kiwata ekayi giye.ekath su eka balanna.ape gedarin ehema hari yanna dunna eka loku deyak....hm....ee unata ape malli karayath mage age gahuwa thaniyama yanawa kiyala.
'gudus gudus gudus..'

meka hama thissema kerena deyak nowe.

kiya awashya nam indiyawata pamanak nowa amerikawata da padam iganwimata tharam shi්ra lankawa pohosath wi aththe janadhipathithuma senadhinayakaya washayen gath thindu, thirana nisaya.shi්ra lanka janadhipathiwaraya mita kalayaka sita karanu labana pa්rakasha ada lokaye boho nayakayin sidukirimen peni yanne tha්rasthawadi gataluwa itha hondin awabodha karagena thibenne shi්ra lankawa bawayi.

eeta nayakathwaya diya yuththe pashu sampath sanwardhana mandalaya ha ema mandalaya ayath wana adala amathyanshayayi.janadhipathiwaraya mewara ayawaya kathawen illa sitinne sama kuda kiri gowiyakuta ma kiri gawayingen dinakata kiri litar 10k dakwa kiri nishpadanaya wadi kara ganimata awashya thakshana danuma laba diya yuthu bawayi.

shri lankawa samaga aarakshaka sambandhatha wadidiyunu karaganimata woshintanaya apeksha karanne ehi aasiyanu pasipik kalapaya thula adhipathi balayalesa thahawuru wimata militari dhawanaya wegawath kara athi thathwaya thula ya.
onna ithin kawuruwath ahanna epa mayiyage aththa nama mokak da kiyala...
man methana inne goyinswa balanna
mama uuta wiriththimi...
ethakota me wage thathwayak thula itha pahadili lesa minissu nawatha aapassata thibuna thathwaya wada hondayi kiyana tharamata yanna ida thiyenawa.
sathwayan ge wisithuru bawa athi wi thibenne da, sithe wisithuru bawa nisa ya.
samahara wita mama ewani de nokala nam mita wada chithrapata rasaka rangapanna mata awasthawa labenna thibuna.
eekayi rekod karanne.
mona rupawahini chanal ekeda pennuwe.

athamwita ewan rogabadha samanga boho mahalu wayase sitina ayada owunge gnyathin ho duwadaruwoda mewani illim karathi.
eka karunakata sampurna kala yuthu lipi lekhana kihipayaki.
man potha wahala dala un denna ekkama midulata aawa.
unwahanse arisimale aaranya senasanadhipathi wahanse pamanak nowa uthura, nagenahira depalathe saha thamankaduwa disawe pradhana sangha nayaka hamuduruwoya.
ma guru kamaraye sita bala siti saralamada me.
ese namuth jawipe dan ee gana kathawak natha.
thawa ee wage parana sinduwaka dekaka kaliwala nawa ridma giya.
adatath ee widubime shilpaya bedadenawa ethuma...

shrilanipa naithika parshawaya thula dan siduwanne hamalin nuwara nala karaya pasupasa miyo tika ohe giya wage amathi waradana thaka ejapa pasupasa yamaki.
sewayata yana kanthawan lingika puhunuwim walata..!
aya tharamak lassana wiya yuthuya.
wes welagena satan igena gaththa kantha charitha eda thibba bawa, angampora pawa igena gena thiyanawa.....ithin ...linga wiparyasa unath eekayi......
ithin wiweka kalaya melesa nam maha mathiwaranayata pasu kalaye wipaka kelesa nam wewida kiya kimata eka udaharanayak pamanak sahena bawa sithanawa.
janapathi nowu thaththa - ammage wipaksha udgoshana wishwasabhanga walata menma ayiyage saha mage wruthiya samithi illim walata thaththa uththara dunne ranil men sinaweni.....
ee nisa rupawahini, widiyo gem wage dewal walata daruwanwa yomu karala thama katayuthu karaganna demapiyan pelambaenawa.
palamu gal aguru nawa magin metrik ton 60,000 – 64,000 dakwa pramanayak gal aguru genwimata niyamithaya.
mehidi chinaye nishpadana karmantha wisin wadidiyunu karagatha yuthu ansha 9k ha anagatha china karmika diyunuwata wadagath karmantha 10kda handunagena thibenawa.
eeth mage mathaya anuwa nam me okkoma boru.

bohoma amaruwen bihi karagath me samaja kramaya aaraksha karagena janathawata mitath wada uthum - uththarithara samajayaka jiwath wime wasanawa langa karawimatayi sowiyat lekhakayan ada wayam karanne.
dijital puwathpatha oonama welawaka igena samaga, oonama thanaka, kumana obe pradeshaya thula ha lowa wata sidu we.
handuna nogath wairas unak dakunu palathe
onna mamanam mage munupothe danwimak damma....!!!
obe pilithuru niwaradiyi.
the wani unusum pana, ambaa, chis, malu, mas, piti, yogat samanga mishra nokala yuthu ya.
api yanakota eeka peraluna.
dan pawathwena boho dansal me mukhya paramartha thunenma baharawa athi athara samajayatada mahath hiriharayak wana mattamata wati thibe.
me siddhiya pasu pasa owunge kriyakalapayata drushtimaya hethuwath eyayi.
mata niwadu ada natha..
tharaka, dedunu, grahawasthu, awalamba, saila, thapaya aadi meki no ki dahasakuth ekak dewal pilibandawa eya thorathuru wimasayi.
kese wethath mema siddhiya sambandhayen sidukarana parikshana thawamath awasan wi nomathi bawa rahas polisiya adhikaranayata danum dunna.
umariya wiwaha wenne dimithri samanga.
samaharu magin bahinawa..

hari ehenam onna man pahalin dunna ara ganna....eekema athi
wahanse sithin dakimatayi uthsaha karanne.
kalekata kalin mata hithena dewal kiyala ekak me dewa liwa..

sinhalayan aanduwe parikshana katayuthu gana nam sahimakata path wenne naha
eeka nisa mama yanawa wena thanakata"
eeka lokal pi.wi.si bisnas ekak.
ohu soya me wana wita nawika hamuda kimidum kandayam meheyum aarambha kara thibenawa.
mewan githa yali yalith api atharata genenawata.
uuth hithagena inne porak kiyala. 71 kalli gahagena, passe eken panala untama gem dena gaman ahinsaka minisuntath kelewuwa.
adala thorathura mita pera wisin elidakwe.
gamini disanayaka aakarshaniya lesa tharkanukulawa janathawa samipakota gaththeya.
eewagema yojana thiyanawanam kiyanna.
"bandalage hawa" kiyala damme, sanga weda guru "goyi" kamkaru, bandage sankalpayak nisa..
pathipala kohomada weyida danne na neda..
meya galigamuwe gnyanadipa himiyan ma samanga pawasu kathawaki.
aththata ma ingrisi itha apuru lesa penena deyak, wena bhashawakadi apurwathwayak athi karanne na.
rata kramawath widiyata aahara ganna.

pettiya wate mal kalambaawal.
passe mama karadiyanaaru polisiyata mema pura wasthu haniya pilibandawa paminili kala.
